name: Home Alone Christmas Sweater T-Shirt
description: Ugly Christmas sweaters featuring crochet reindeer and snowflakes are as festive as eggnog. The 1990 classic Home Alone is also a tradition enjoyed by many around the holidays. Bringing the two together is a Christmas miracle. Our Merry Christmas You Filthy Animal t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page.

name: Chicago Drink Local T-Shirt
description: Chicago loves it's beer. The Chicago area is home to almost 100 breweries, including widely distributed Goose Island and craft institutions such as Half Acre, Revolution and Three Floyds. Don't drink the generic watered-down swill. Choose to drink local. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: '85 Bears T-Shirt
description: The ‘85 Bears team was truly a team of destiny. From Sweetness to the Super Bowl Shuffle, from Jim McMahon's headband to Iron Mike’s backhand. Sport this Chicago Bears T-shirt to remind yourself, though its been 27 years, we will never stop talking about the ’85 Bears. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: '85 Bears Crewneck
description: The ‘85 Bears team was truly a team of destiny. From Sweetness to the Super Bowl Shuffle, from Iron Mike’s backhand to Jim McMahon's headband - they were arguably the best team in NFL history. Sport this 1985 Bears T-shirt to remind yourself, though its been 26 years, we will never stop talking about the ’85 Bears. Our Bears crewnecks are hand-printed on quality sweatshirts. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Peanut Tillman's Punch Out T-Shirt
description: Charles "Peanut" Tillman has been a cornerstone of the Chicago Bears defense since 2003. Aside from being a shutdown cornerback, he is known for his ball punches, or "peanut punches" which rival the punches from the classic NES game, Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! On November 4th, Tillman's right hook forced four fumbles - the most forced fumbles in a game by a single player in league history. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page.

name: Jay Cutler T-Shirt
description: Jay Cutler is the most exciting quarterback Chicago has seen since the Truman administration. With all the unwarranted criticism he has received, be sure to let everyone know that - Jay Cutty is my buddy. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Other sizes available upon request for all our men's and women's Chicago Bears shirts.

name: Walter Payton Sweetness T-Shirt | Heather Gray
description: Walter Payton has the second most rushing yards in NFL history and is one of the most admired Chicago athletes of all time. Sport this Walter Payton Shirt to commemorate how sweet that '85 Bears team really was. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Ditka "Most Interesting Man in the World" T-Shirt
description: Mike Ditka, the man, the myth and the legend, is far more interesting than that Dos Equis guy. This Ditka T-shirt proves that “not always drinking beer” doesn’t make you the most interesting man in the world, being coach of the greatest football team in history does. Sport this Bears T-shirt and when you look in the mirror, your reflection will give you two thumbs up. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

Sport this Sunday Funday T-Shirt to show the world that you refuse to hang up your party pants on Saturday but extend it to an epic Sunday funday. Our Sunday Funday t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

Sport this Ditka vs. God T-shirt at the next Chicago Bears game to truly understand what it means to be a Super Fan. Daa Bears. Our Chicago Bears t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Commit To The Indian Hawks T-Shirt
description: During a rant, former Blackhawks coach Denis Savard told his players to "Commit to the Indian, commit to the jersey." This phrase soon became the unofficial slogan of the Chicago Blackhawks and was taken up by the fans. Have you committed to the Indian yet? This Chicago Blackhawks t-shirt are hand-printed on super-soft ring spun cotton shirts. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page.

name: Commit To The Indian Hawks Hoodie
description: During a rant, former Blackhawks coach Denis Savard told his players to "Commit to the Indian, commit to the jersey." name: Hog Butchers for the World Chicago T-Shirt
description: Chicago used to be the center of meatpacking in the United States. At meatpacking plants, animals such as pigs and cows are turned into meat for humans to eat. Though it used to be more of a negative connotation, Chicago has now embraced the nickname. While the Union Stock Yards closed in 1970, the city will always be known as the "Hog Butchers for the World." Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: City of Broad Shoulders Chicago T-Shirt
description: In the late 1800's, Chicago was a gritty yet booming industrial town. Built as a working class city, Chicago relied on the hard work of European immigrants and freed slaves. It was then and will forever be known as the City of Broad Shoulders. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

Our Chicago Love design is hand-printed on 100% organic cotton tote bags.  

Size: 18” W x 15” H x 4” D

name: Script Chicago T-Shirt
description: Chi-town, Chi-city, Chi-cago. Home...in classic script text. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Wrigley Field T-Shirt
description: 1060 West Addison is a place that may bring joy to some and to others conjure up memories of Bartman, black cats, and billygoats. No matter what, it has always the best place in the city to enjoy a cold Old Style on a warm summer afternoon. Sport this Wrigley Field shirt at your next Cubs game. Or, if you moved away from Chicago, wear this Unique Cubs T-shirt to remind everyone else how much better your field is than theirs, even if your team isn’t. Our Cubs t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Vintage Cubs T-Shirt
description: Well there have been 17 presidents, 6 American wars and 5 new states added to the nation since the Chicago Cubs won their last World Series. However, Cubs fans everywhere will never lose hope that one of these years will be our year yet again. Sport this Vintage Chicago Cubs Shirt the next time your at Wrigley to remind everyone (maybe even yourself) that someday, somehow, it's gonna happen! So, don't hate on 1908. Our Cubs t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Blues Brothers T-Shirt
description: This Blues Brothers T-Shirt features the drivers licence of Elwood Blues of The Blues Brothers’ Show Band and Revue. It is complete with his fictitious Wrigley Field address and is absolutely necessary when you're on a mission from God. "It's 106 miles to Chicago, we got a full tank of gas, half a pack of cigarettes, it's dark... and we're wearing sunglasses. Hit It." This Blues Brothers t-shirt is hand-printed on quality preshrunk 50/50 shirts. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Other sizes and styles available upon request for our Blues Brothers shirts.

name: Funny Cubs T-Shirt
description: Webster’s Dictionary defines insanity as doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. If this is true, most Cubs fans should have sought serious medical attention years ago. Many a Cubs team have tried and failed since 1908, yet fans still remain true. Let this Cubs T-shirt be a reminder that you may blame the team, your parents or even Old Style for why you are a fan. But deep down inside you know that you are the one responsible for the sadness and pain that is being a Cubs fan. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me 100+ times, shame on me. Our Cubs t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Ron Santo T-Shirt
description: This Ron Santo shirt pays tribute to the ultimate Cubs fan and one of the most courageous and respected Chicago athletes of all time. As a player he was known for his dominant third base skills, his nine All-Star Game appearances and his trademark clicking of his heels after a Cubs victory. We will also remember him however, for being an entertaining voice on the radio, as he never hid his allegiance to the Cubs. Our Cubs t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Ron Santo Hoodie
description: This Ron Santo sweatshirt pays tribute to the ultimate Cubs fan and one of the most courageous and respected Chicago athletes of all time. As a player he was known for his dominant third base skills, his nine All-Star Game appearances and his trademark clicking of his heels after a Cubs victory. We will also remember him however, for being an entertaining voice on the radio, as he never hid his allegiance to the Cubs. He will be truly missed. Our Cubs hoodies are hand-printed on quality sweatshirts. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Championship Coaches Chicago Flag T-Shirt
description: Our generation has only seen four great teams that have gone all the way in terms of championships and bad-assness. Each team has had a leader (Mike Ditka, Phil Jackson, Ozzie Guillen and Joel Quenneville) that has intimidated their opponents through cunning play-calling and distinguished facial hair. Fashion this Chicago Flag T-Shirt the next time you’re at a centennial party for the last Cubs World Series win. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Disco Demolition White Sox T-Shirt
description: July 12, 1979 at Comiskey Park was the night Disco went up in smoke…literally. The highlight of the night was supposed to be the blowing up of a crate full of disco records in the middle of the field. The event attracted over 90,000 “strange people” according to Harry Carey (Sox broadcaster at the time). This quickly escalated into a drug induced, disco-hating, souvenir-stealing riot. Sport this throwback White Sox T-Shirt the next time you put on a BeeGees record and think about the great days at Old Comiskey Park. Our White Sox t-shirts are hand-printed on quality tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: White Sox T-Shirt
description: Chicago White Sox fans have many reasons to be prideful, whether it be their ’05 championship or the fact that one of their own is the leader of the free world. Sport this South Side T-shirt the next time you’re supporting the side of town that has success within the last 100 years. Our White Sox t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Hawk Harrelson's Hawkisms T-Shirt
description: Ken “Hawk” Harrelson is an interesting fella, to say the least. Not only has he made up his own dialect, but no announcer in history has walked the line of FCC regulations closer. Sport this Hawk Harrelson “Hawkisms” T-shirt and help decode this eccentric broadcaster’s language. Sox fans, if you don’t want to be a Hiney Bird, you better Hunker Down and fashion this Hawk Harrelson T-shirt. Our White Sox t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Malort T-Shirt
description: Malort is a staple in Chicago area watering holes. Brought over from Sweden and only served in Chicago, Malort translates to "wormword," which gives most of its consumers the dreaded "Malort face" shortly after downing a shot. Malort is often called "Northern Discomfort" but will always be uniquely Chicago. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Gettin Down in Chitown T-Shirt
description: Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Chicago St. Patrick's Day T-Shirt
description: For over 40 years, the Chicago River has been dyed a gorgeous shade of green to emulate the Emerald Isle. Even though the river remains a murky green color for pretty much the rest of the year, it’s the best St. Patty’s tradition anywhere in the world. Celebrate the Irish in all of us with a green beer, shot of whiskey and our St. Patrick’s Day Shirt. Our Chicago t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: St. Patrick's Day T-Shirt
description: Everyone's got one. The designated St. Patrick's Day shirt that's usually crammed in the back of the closet for most of the year. It's usually green, smells bad and is often adorned with Guinness stains. This year, don't mess around with those half-witted crude catchphrase shirts and focus on what St. Patrick's Day is really about - socially accepted public intoxication. Our St. Patrick's Day t-shirts are hand-printed on super soft, ring-spun tees. For information on sizing, please see our Sizing Chart page. Please contact us for additional sizes.

name: Chitown Clothing Logo T-Shirt
description:
All Chitown Clothing shirts come with seamless rib collars and shoulder-to-shoulder taping. Our t-shirts have easy-care fabric and are constructed with comfort in mind.

For information on sizing, please see our Size Chart page. 

For washing, please wash cold and inside out. Hang dry.

Larger sizes available upon request for both men's and women's Blackhawks shirts.

name: Chitown Clothing Button
description: 1.5" Round Button

name: Custom Order
description:
Not finding your correct size? Want a design in a different color? We offer custom orders for all of our men's, women's and kid's t-shirts and hoodies. Just order your size here and add in the notes at checkout what design and color you prefer!

Custom orders are sent directly from our printer and can take up to 10 business days to ship. We do not allow exchanges or returns for any custom orders. 

Please email us at info@chitownclothing.com for any questions about custom orders.
